title: Week 13: Conversational AI - Multimodal Interfaces for Human-Robot Interaction
description: This document explores the concept of multimodal interfaces in the context of human-robot interaction, combining speech with other modalities like vision, gestures, and haptics to create more natural and intuitive communication channels.
